dcterms:creator: M. M. Churpek
T. C. Yuen
S. Y. Park
R. Gibbons
D. P. Edelson
dcterms:description: A dataset containing electronic health record data for a heterogeneous cohort of 6,094 patients admitted to the Ronald Reagan UCLA medical center, used to develop and validate a prediction model for adverse outcomes on the wards.
dcterms:title: EHR dataset for a heterogeneous cohort of 6,094 patients

dcterms:creator: M. J. Rothman
S. I. Rothman
J. Beals
dcterms:description: A continuous measure of patient condition developed using electronic medical record data, validated for use in clinical settings.
dcterms:title: Rothman index

dcterms:creator: J. Yoon
A. M. Alaa
S. Hu
M. van der Schaar
dcterms:description: A prognostic decision support system designed for timely prediction of intensive care unit admissions, utilizing a multi-task Gaussian process model.
dcterms:title: ForecastICU

dcterms:creator: S. Yu
S. Leung
M. Heo
G. J. Soto
R. T. Shah
S. Gunda
dcterms:description: A comparison of risk prediction scoring systems for ward patients, including APACHE II and SOFA scores, evaluated through a retrospective nested case-control study.
dcterms:title: APACHE II and SOFA scores
